member.name: T:Microsoft.Framework.Logging.LogFormatter
member.summary: Formatters for common logging scenarios.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Framework.Logging.LogFormatter.Formatter(System.Object,System.Exception)
member.summary: Formats a message from the given state and exception, in the form "state exception". If state is an , is used to format the message, otherwise the state's ToString() is used.
